channel.title: rei on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in rei on Barefoot Rob

item.title: bought socks in REI
item.description: 12:26 Wednesday 27 January 2016 CST We didn’t buy an ice cream making ball, and didn’t replace my backpack, but Travis(!) printed a receipt for my backpack purchase in San Francisco back in 2011. We did buy socks, though, especially after the girl with a 1 cm plug in her ear lobe helped check the size by opening up the package for me. Outside (and inside) Lin took a few pics which I hope the guy from Tokyo TV will be able to use in the broadcast.
